TopicTitle: International construction ISS in Kerbal orbit.

Articles.Content:
Yogui isn't making the Rassvet. Oh, and the modules are ready. He PMed them to BobCat, who'll be rolling in some updates of his own, too.

First of all, Nauka has been delayed so many times, we're not actually sure if it will ever launch, so that's why it wasn't being made. Secondly, the Science Power Module was cancelled nearly 5 years ago. Any pictures you've seen of the ISS with that on it are severely outdated. Here is a picture of the ISS on orbit, as taken by the crew of the STS-132, the second to last space shuttle to dock to the station, back in 2010. The only difference is the AMS module on the S3 Truss, and the ELC-3 on the P3 Truss.

Actually, the Science Power Platform was canceled. SPMs, on the other hand, are still very possible. They're part of the OPSEK project, which may be assembled docked to ISS. Oh, and FGB-2 will most definitely launch. Just give it some time, it's already built and only needs to undergo some cleanup/repair work. Two of it's parts are already up there, with the Rassvet module. It's only a matter of time.
Is this still live? Should I expect an update?

Well, I've just found a few bugs in Z1 Truss and PMed Yogui about them. Minor ones, mostly. I'm currently in (slow) process of building the ISS using the CSS, for testing purposes. So it's nearly working, should be ready for release. When an actual upload is coming is up to BobCat. If I find no real bugs with the ISS during construction, I'm gonna pester BobCat about releasing the update. I've also added an NFP-derived radiator and solar panel for the ISS (already launched the latter, but not the former. Once the former is up and deployed, I'll send it over to BobCat, too).

As far as I'm concerned, the existing ISS parts work. The updated robotic arms are rock-solid, CSS is balanced just right for ISS missions, and the parts are beautiful and work great. The only thing missing is the MBS, external stowage pallets, AMS-2 and Rassvet (the one I'm going to use is this: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/mir-docking-port/).

Edited April 23, 2014 by Guest

Do u have the s5 and p5 trusses?

Nope, and I'm afraid they're not coming unless someone remakes the truss, preferably using InfernalRobotics for rotary joints. I've jure-rigged mine. BobCat said something about his own update he'll be adding, but I doubt it'd contain S5 and P5.

What parts did u use to make yours? and how do u attach the Z0 truss to the station?

when are iva's coming for all the modules

Guys can you help me. I have problem with module Unity. I built a rocket in VAB with Unity module on it and clicked launch. And on the launch pad I could not see stages. Tested several times with module uniity on board of the rocket and without it. And in case unity is on the rocket the stages somehow are not visible on the launch pad. Any suggestion ? Thank you
Hmm, that is usually caused by a missing (but defined) IVA, but this shouldn't happen, as Unity never had an IVA.

Thank you Dragoob01 It was it. I deleted some of the SQUAD's cockpits. And Unity is using mk1cockpit from squad.

Thanks for help.

Have a nice day
